columns.name: core_limit
columns.description: The number of requests per hour the client is currently limited to.

columns.name: core_remaining
columns.description: The number of remaining requests the client can make this hour.

columns.name: core_reset
columns.description: The time at which the current rate limit will reset.

columns.description: The number of requests per hour the client is currently limited to.

columns.name: search_remaining
columns.description: The number of remaining requests the client can make this hour.

columns.name: search_reset
columns.description: The time at which the current rate limit will reset.
